name: CapCall
description:
CapCall (IOM) Ltd (“CapCall”) was created to provide call centre and business service solutions on a global scale. We are based in the town of Ramsey in the Isle of Man and are able to offer you a full blended international call centre service meaning both inbound and outbound campaigns are facilitated seamlessly. At CapCall we believe that your customers’ overall experience is the key to your success and therefore this ethos underpins our service.
CapCall works closely with you, in order to fully understand your business objectives and culture. We carefully analyse your Campaign needs and requirements in order to accurately identify and assign resource and system requirements. Additionally, in close liaison with you, we assess your Campaign growth and forecasts and include them in our Contact Centre Service Provision proposals and Pricing Models.
